subject: C++ Development contest: $1,500 in prizes
body:
Hello sm1lies,

We've got a reposted Development project now open for registration, with $1,500 in total prizes.

The Titan Segment Service Version 1.0 is a C++ component. The component will provide a stand-alone executable, and has little dependency on other components -- basically, it's the perfect opportunity for C++ developers to get into the component game and earn some money. 

And don't forget: With the new rules for the Digital Run, placement points are tied to prize money, so this is also a great chance to earn twice the DR points of a standard Development project. 

Learn more and register here: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ProjectDetail&pj=30001930

Good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
